sourcesContent:
<template>
    <svg
      :class="svgClass"
      aria-hidden="true"
    >
      <use :xlink:href="iconName" />
    </svg>
  </template> 
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: "SvgIcon",
    props: {
      iconClass: {
        type: String,
        required: true,
      },
      className: {
        type: String,
        default: "",
      },
    },
    computed: {
      iconName () {
        return `#icon-${this.iconClass}`;
      },
      svgClass () {
        if (this.className) {
          return "svg-icon " + this.className;
        } else {
          return "svg-icon";
        }
      },
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .svg-icon {
    width: 3em;
    height: 3em;
    vertical-align: -0.15em;
    fill: currentColor;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  </style>
